thread.section_title: InMyArea.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of InMyArea.com | inmyarea.com
thread.title: Matt

author: Matt
title: Matt
text: Very personable and helpful, Rebecca helped me set up internet in our new home. She was easy to talk to and answered all of my questions in a patient, knowledgeable way. She also gave me her office phone number so I could contact her with any additional questions I have in the future. I couldn't be happier to switch from Comcast to Rebecca and AT&T - the difference in customer service is night and day!
